II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 386
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ish¨ u oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2012 cqks ui 01 jeks Èk
m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2012 uehs ui 18 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg

385 - B 80613 — 2,200 (2012/05)
D 1 -

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
ie' hq'- 2012'05'18 Èk m< jQ  wxl 1"759 ork .eiÜ m;%fha I-III iy IV ^w& fldgia m< fkdùh'
ie' hq' - (i)  jrdh iy .=jka f;dgqm, ixj¾Ok nÿ  ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2012 ud¾;= ui 09 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§
ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%fha  II jeks fldgfia  w;sf¾lhla jYfhka  m<lrk ,§ ;
(ii) Y%S ,xld mß.Kl ix.uh ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;  2012 ud¾;= ui 09 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha
.eiÜ m;%fha  II  jeks fldgfia  w;sf¾lhla jYfhka  m<lrk ,§;
(iii) uqo,a mk;a flgqïm; 2012 ud¾;= ui 09 jeks Èk  Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%fha  II  jeks fldgfia
w;sf¾lhla jYfhka  m<lrk ,§'
fujr m<jk .eiÜ m;%fha V fldgfia 2008 j¾Ifha ckjdß-ud¾;= ld¾;=jg wod<j uqøK Ys,amSkaf.a yd m%ldYlhskaf.a wd{dmk;
hgf;a ,shdmÈxÑ jQ fmd;a kdudj,shla bx.%Sis NdIdfjka m<fõ'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2012'05'25386
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - lE.,a,
l,a bl=;aj we;s kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
lE.,a, ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj" wjika lrk ,o j¾I mylg ^05& jvd merKs my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2012'08'17
Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
02' fuu kvqjg wod< hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda
kvqjg f.dkqlr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2012'08'17 Èkg m%:ufhka fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj;
bÈßm;a l< hq;=h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2012'08'17 Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha
mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'

uyskao  rdcmlaI l%Svd wOHdmksl yd wOHd;añl ixj¾Ok moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls

md¾,sfïka;=fõ § bÈßm;a lsÍug  woyia lrk nj fuhska oekqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;a  wruqK jkqfha my; i|yka fmdÿ mrud¾: j,ska hqla; jkakd jQ tlS moku ixia:d.; lsÍuhs'
